name: 蘇進國
objective:
1. Deterioration of concrete structures. 
2. Visual and non-destructive inspection. 
3. Condition evaluation and analysis. 
4. Maintenance and repair design.
schedule:
1 week-Introduction (rules, exam and grading)
2~3 week-Deterioration types of structures (building)
4 week-Deterioration types of structures (bridge)
5~6 week-Visual Inspection (building)
7~8 week-Visual Inspection (bridge-D.E.R.U.)
9 week-Mid-term exam
10~11 week-Destructive & nondestructive inspection
12~14 week-Condition Evaluation and Analysis
15~17 week-Maintenance and Repair Design
18 week-Final exam
scorePolicy:
1. Mid-term exam 30%
2. Final exam 30%
3. Assignment 20%
4. Attendance 10%
5. Learning attitude 10%
materials: Teaching material will be provided in due course.
